about_the_game:
This The Neverland of the Mountain and Sea OST album has a total duration of 58 minutes and contains 13 meticulously composed tracks. The format includes 320Kbps MP3 and lossless FLAC. It comes with an introductory PDF personally arranged by the musician Gustav Yu.

We hope these musical pieces will once again transport you into the world of The Neverland of the Mountain and Sea.

* The introductory booklet is only available in Simplified Chinese.
